title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Nearby Attractions              Nearby Attractions       Alcatraz Island To purchase ferry boat tickets to visit Alcatraz Island go to Pier 31½. From the entrance to Hyde Street Pier it is about a twelve block walk to the east along Jefferson Street which turns into The Embarcadero. Pier 31½ is located where Bay Street intersects The Embarcadero. Alcatraz is part of the Golden Gate National Recreation Area.
